methods.name: getAllManagedContent
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ManagedContentVersionCollection getAllManagedContent(String communityId, Integer pageParam, Integer pageSize, String language, String managedContentType)
methods.description: Get all managed content versions for a community.

methods.name: getManagedContentByIds
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ManagedContentVersionCollection getManagedContentByIds(String communityId, List<String> managedContentIds, Integer pageParam, Integer pageSize, String language, String managedContentType)
methods.description: Get managed content versions using a list of managed content IDs.

methods.name: getManagedContentByTopics
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ManagedContentVersionCollection getManagedContentByTopics(String communityId, List<String> topics, Integer pageParam, Integer pageSize, String language, String managedContentType)
methods.description: Get managed content versions using a list of content topic names.

methods.name: getManagedContentByTopicsAndIds
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ManagedContentVersionCollection getManagedContentByTopicsAndIds(String communityId, List<String> managedContentIds, List<String> topics, Integer pageParam, Integer pageSize, String language, String managedContentType)
methods.description: Get managed content versions using a list of managed content IDs and content topic names.
